attributes.description: Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Jac Motors westrand AGG Group offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Jac Motors Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today

attributes.description: Originally Delivered New In Germany, This Stunning 968 Retains All Its Manuals, Books And Spare Keys. With Its Unrestored, Original Black Leather Interior And Gleaming Guards Red Exterior, The 968 Is The Last Line Of Four Cylinder Models That Started With The 924, A Model That Arguably Allowed Porsche To Survive As A Company And Thrive Today. The Importance And Dynamic Ability Of These Models Are Now Being Recognised By Collectors All Over The World And Prices Have Already Moved Substantially. The 968 Had Visual Ties With It's Predecessors But Was Actually A Substantially Revised And Better Car. It's 3.0 Four Is Very Torquey And Massively Robust. The Four Itself Was Taken From The 928 V8, Essentially One Bank Of That Engine Making It A Real Porsche Product. The Gearbox Is A 6 Speed Manual And Suspension Was Heavily Revised. Several Parts Were From The Revered 964/993 Series. Only Approximately 4 000 Cabriolets were Built Making This A Very RARE Car. This Example Is Appointed In Classic Guards Red With Just Over 100 000 Km And Loads Of Service History Backing This Up. In February 2022 Over 60k Was Spent At M & R Motors On Restoration. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
attributes.title: 1992 Porsche 928 968 Cabriolet Manual
